StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetSMCRUnitVisitEvent]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
--not sure about input parameters --@PointOfContactID integer, --@En.tyTypeID integer AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN
SELECT
--These columns may be needed by the data contracts for insert/update oe.[FiscalYear], e.[EventID], e.[EventType],
e.[EventName],
-- SMCRReserveUnitName is speci.c to this table --The name of the Selected Marine Corps Reserve Unit. --This is a foreign key from the SMCRReserveUnit table ---It is based Based on OST, Fiscal year and SMCR UnitName sme.[SMCRReserveUnitName],
-- This loca.on will be speci.c to the SMCR unit again store in the -- SMCRReserveUnitEvent table sme.[EventLoca.on],
sme.[NumPlannedVisits], -- this will refer to mul.ple dates sme.[EventDateID],
RTRIM (pc.POCLastName) + ',' + RTRIM(pc.POCFirstName) + '.' + IsNull(substring(pc.POCLegalMiddleName,1,1),'') + '.' AS POCName, [POCLastName], [POCLegalMiddleName], [POCFirstName], [TelephoneNumber], [EmailAddress]
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[SMCRUnitVisitEvent] sme inner join [MCRISS].[USMC].[Organiza.onEvent] oe ON sme.Organiza.onEventID = oe.Organiza.onEventID inner join [MCRISS].[USMC].[Event] e ON e.EventID = oe.EventID le. outer join [MCRISS].[USMC].[EventCoordina.on] ec ON ec.Coordina.onEventID = oe.Coordina.onEventID le. outer join [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] pc ON pc.PointOfContactID = oe.PointOfContactID
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
